TextAsset.value: Oh, so you came after all.
Did she actually want me to come along or what?)
I go to the nurse’s office sometimes, so King won’t be too suspicious right away.
And now I’m cured! It’s a miracle.
What? Don’t just stare like that.
Don’t tell me you got fooled by such an obvious joke.
You have a sense of humor…
Well, I’m definitely not smiling anymore.
So why do you go to the nurse’s office?
It’s just an easy way to get out of stuff.
Even if they suspect you’re faking, nobody really argues.
Sometimes sitting in class just gets so overwhelming, you know?
You mean like the homework and stuff?
Seeing you in that gross classroom fluorescent light…
As if you didn’t look ugly enough already.
I don’t think anyone’s looking at you.
Or thinking about you that much.
I mean, no offense, but isn’t that kinda self-centered?
Why would anyone care, even if you were ugly?
I guess you’re right. Nobody really cares.
They’re all just trying to pass the time.
What good is time anyway, if people are always just looking for ways to kill it?
(I’m starting to get annoyed at all her talking like this…
I mean, even she’s gotta see it’s overkill, right?)
Why’d you even ask me to come along?
I mean… I don’t even know what we’re doing yet…
You ask so many questions all the time…
I just thought you would come because I thought you were cool.
I totally understand what you’re talking about!
Anyway… my friend should be meeting us here soon to give me some stuff.
But you have to promise not to tell anyone.
Do you really trust me that much?
(I’m not gonna get a real answer from her, am I.)
You know how school is totally pointless?
And how everything we’re supposed to learn here is just stupid propaganda?
And how it only rewards nerds who can memorize endless trivial details…
That don’t actually have anything to do with anything?
but with your mind instead of a ball.
Even you have to get bored in class sometimes though, right?
What if you could skip through your classes easily…
Perfect grades without having done any homework…
Perfect attendance without ever going to class.
Wouldn’t you want to do that?
The only way to do that, I think…
Would be to enter a cheat code.
You even whispered the word “cheat code”.
So that is what you’re talking about?
Lolo, you wouldn’t actually do that, right?!
Why do you think I was in detention in the first place?
You could really mess yourself up that way!
I didn’t actually get a chance to enter the code.
I got caught in the act.
But I heard the other detention kids talking about some guy who used cheat codes last year!
But when Principal DigDug found out, the guy got expelled from Namco High!
I know a guy who can get me a way better cheat code than that.
And that kid was so dumb!
Of course somebody’s gonna notice if you’re in recess all the time.
But if I can godmode my way through class…
The teachers will just think I’m studying harder.
Just because you think everyone is stupid doesn’t mean they actually are!
People are gonna notice you’re using cheat codes.
Maybe that’d at least be interesting.
How can you talk about yourself that way?!
Don’t you care about yourself at all?!
Why are you asking me that...
Waiting to see if I ever do anything cool.
...Is that why you invited me along?
I really don’t care about seeming cool.
I really did just want some cheat codes for easy A’s.
It just doesn’t seem like you…
I think you wanted me here…
Because you think of me as a nice person…
And you knew I would stop you.
You don’t really want to use cheat codes.
But you’re stuck playing this stupid “I don’t care” game.
But you figured I’m such a do-gooder,
you could count on me to stop you instead.
But he was like you… always nice to me.
Totally just taking pity because of how dumb I was.
But he had no idea, and neither do you…
How much worse all that nice stuff made me feel.
That sometimes people try their hardest,
but it never matters, because it never works out.
Just like me, working so hard to be a priestess.
But I never got any better.
I was always so hopeless at it, but…
I actually believed I could do it…
Just like all the other dumb students in this school.
Not knowing it’ll never take them anywhere.
It just makes me so sad, okay?!
And maybe I wanted to skip over that with a cheat code.
Maybe this isn’t what Klonoa would’ve done, but...
I’m not going to try to stop you.
I believe you can do that yourself.
How long have you been standing behind me!
Long enough to know you two are SKIPPING DETENTION!
You two shall face DETENTION LEVEL SEVEN:
AHA! THAT’S WHY ITS SO BRILLIANT!
Anything you do in the next 20 minutes…
Simply because I said it was!
Pushing the boundaries of what society calls “detention”!
(And so, we had some time to ourselves to talk.
Lolo suggested we do our detention on the roof.
It seemed as good a place as any.)
This spot is pretty, isn’t it.
Is it a place you actually like?
It just feels like the kinda place that I should like.
If King and Principal Dig Dug hadn’t stopped us…
Would you have still tried to get the cheat code?
No. But I didn’t change exactly, either. It’s hard to explain.
Was it because of… that person?
Heh. What, are you jealous? He wasn’t my boyfriend or anything.
Not really in the way you’re thinking.
Why are you asking so many stupid questions?
I just want to understand you.
Do you have a picture of Klonoa?
It’s here in the pocket of my dress actually.
...This looks like… It was cut out of a yearbook.
From when I was studying magic at the priestess school.
I wish you’d just give me a straight answer.
I bet you’re really regretting following me out to the hall right now.
